name: Vakaland
description:
Toggle the abduction engine with the spiral button and get some cows, but be careful, some might have dangerous devices attached to them. Also avoid the laser mines.

Find the right speed for your ship and set the world camera as you want at any time.

This game is completely free, but If you want to make a tiny donation, by now you can do it through BinancePay to ID 226220946

Thanks and enjoy  it!
